name: Weewit the Space Axolotl
description:
Game made in 2 days for ScoreSpace Jam #14 - Theme Merge + Scoreboard. Solo developer.

Goal:

Help Weewit, our Space Axolotl to survive as long as possible! He's trapped in maze and there are evil animals blocking his fun.

How to play:
  • Hold LMB (Left Mouse Button) to run faster. Release it to have Weewit run slower.
  • Don't get hit.
  • GAME is hard at first but gets easier once you get the hang!! Everything obstacle is doable!
  • Choose between 9 different merges:
  • Speed : Faster
  • Spider Web/Ball and chain: Lose Score
  • Green +: Gain score
  • Shackles: Makes you slower (might be good depending on strategy)
  • Shrinking Ray: Makes you smaller (great)
  • Apple: A bit bigger (usually not good)Godzilla: Try for yourself :)
Tips

Give the game a couple tries, it's hard at first but once you get the hang it's not that difficult (I've made some 200seconds+ runs). Being good depends on skill and correct timing. And of course, avoid bad buffs at all costs (apple, godzilla).

There are a couple strategies:

  1. Going slow and "farming" survival time/shrinking ray.
  2. Going VERY fast and farming +2/+3 second merges
